message.body: I fucking hate homework -.-
Those are harsh words
True ones though
It disturbs me that people think it's perfectly okay to be completely un-curious about life.
The bad that comes along with the good. I struggle to accept things like that myself
I like doing the readings, mostly.
I just hate writing papers
I hate that now I finally have things that I want to write about, but I feel like I need to put them aside because I have a responsibility
to write these other papers that are only tangential to my interests
I always rebeled against those types of assignments. If a teacher requested something specific, I would try my best to use it as inappropriately as possible. I still managed good grades somehow
lol
I've done that a few times in this class
I think its the lack of control that you 'hate'
Not really
It's the fact that I'm absolutely shit at banging out a meaningless paper
And if I'm not interested enough in the subject, it's going to be meaningless and trite
I rely a lot on inspiration, less on hard work =/
God I'm tired.

Yes but you know you're just going through the motions. If the teacher told you to just write something, you wouldn't have a problem. It the specific that bothers you, or just the fact that its not on your terms
And whiny
says the man who whines constantly about women.
Not that I'm disagreeing, necessarily. I do get whiny when I'm tired.
It's really bad when I'm super exhausted and something frustrates me
Haha, is that you giving me the finger?
yes
I've amassed a small collection of emoticons
Have you ever found a memory and been like "wow, I was a bright child" or something similar?
I mean it as a negative, and I don't take your flicking off personally
All the time =|
You shouldn't. I don't mean anything personally/offensively by it.
I feel like I was a bright child, but I had adults tell me that I was so I don't know if my self-reflection is accurate
yeah
in 5th grade I was one of six students in the gifted program. Talk about building an ego at an early age
lol
not to get back on the topic, but it's one of the reasons I don't understand when women are indifferent toward me. I'm like, "What is she nuts? I'm fucking fantastic!"
lol
Because everyone loves egos ;)
I like to think of it as confidence
You can think of it however you want; your opinion on the matter has no affect on someone else's perception. ^_^
of course not
I do try to tone it down, at least at first.
I suppose you're more qualified to tell me how I come off upon first meeting
subjective as it is
To be honest, it seems like you go out of your way to be slightly more abrasive than you actually are
hmm
Maybe that's just with me though
/shrug
I think you're full of shit ;-)
/shrug
I've often wondered if you were trying to get me to stop talking to you, lol
it depends on how well I know the person and the venue. If I don't know them well, I think I go out of my way to be nice, which isn't hard for me
Right, which is why I said it might just be with me
If I know you well, I can be entirely too honest
I don't think my personality says "please treat me with kid gloves"
not at all
I'm more than a little abrasive myself at times
right, so once I catch on to the other persons demeanor I can be more open
It's weird, but I used to be overly accommodating to the individual(s) I was with. Around nicer people, I was 'nicer'. Around tougher people I would be, well, more myself or even 'jerky'
That's what I meant
You come across as a real ass sometimes.
And then I see you interacting with more "normal" people, and you're super nice.
At least comparatively.
I think I've got a pretty decent grasp on how you are these days.
But the fuck if I could articulate it.
"normal" people?
ok, I'll admit last sunday morning, I was a jerk
Normal people... people who aren't necessarily at the cutting edge of intelligence, or who aren't used to snarkiness.
Haha.
I just thought that was odd.
I was half asleep and may have just been being a jerk in order to be surprising
or interesting
or awkward
Odd.
Definitely odd.
I entertain myself entirely too much, and at times I don't realize that others may not find it entertaining in the same way
Yeah.
I'll take odd
I dated a 'sensitive' girl for a while. It didn't work out
but I do associate myself as nice
For half a second, I wondered if you thought I was going to make things weird/awkward. Then I concluded that *you* probably would have made things somewhat awkward had I stayed, haha.
what I was trying to communicate, and failed at, was that you could of just snuck out the door in order to make things 'easier' and I wouldnt have cared
Ah
I considered it, when I saw that you were 'sleeping', but figured that'd be kind of a dick move
see
And as much as I can seem like an asshole, I generally try not to be.
I don't often see things as 'dick' moves
they're just moves, or actions, with no malicious intent
agreed. It's nearly impossible to offend me, therefore I find it odd when something I say or do is offensive to someone else
Yeah.
It's mostly your delivery, I think.
Sometimes it's hard to tell if you're being serious or joking.
You've got that deadpan/slightly sarcastic delivery down perhaps too well.
thanks
I feel that if you're not sure if I'm serious or joking, then I have succeeded
See, that's great and all, but when you do shit like that, you're really narrowing your dating pool.
I have two roommates now, and I'm not sure how it's all going to work. I've already given kristin a hard time once today =|
Maybe that's why you're not having as much luck as you'd like =P
lol
eh, I dunno. Last date I went on I was being purposely nice. She was the one that was snarky
http://i.imgur.com/PV5qI.jpg
hmm
I do need to do some climbing

So I wanted to through something out there. I know we're busy this weekend, but if you'd like to do something during the week sometime I could meet you up in west chester or you could come down to wilmington after work
This week is no-go, next week I have some flexibility
agreed, this week is bad for me as well. Next week is kind of up in the air but definitely a possibility
tues-thurs are best bet for me
Tuesday looks free, Wednesday I might be going somewhere in Conshohocken for beer, Thursday is probably out.
might have a couchsurfer coming to stay a few days but other than that Im game
You might enjoy this thread http://www.reddit.com/r/AskReddit/comments/tbmxn/today_i_sang_a_duet_through_my_kitchen_window/
I'm going to bed
gnite

"I was walking through a Kroger grocery store singing Tenacious D's "fuck her gently". It wasn't very loud due to the lewd content of the song.
I paused before the next verse, and as I start I hear an awesome harmony coming from behind me. I turn around and see a 40ish Asian male cheesing hardcore as he sang."
awesome song!
ok, I see what you mean now. This is what I said to Val just now: "seeing is overrated. as is college. I didn't go to college and can't see shit and I turned out fine"
